content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DTHDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: DTHFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CORE-000007
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when DTHDTC is not empty and DTHFL not equal to "Y"
Outcome:
  Message: DTHFL is not "Y", when DTHDTC is populated
  Output Variables:
    - DTHDTC
    - DTHFL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0435
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: DTHDTC[The date or date and time of death, represented
                  in a standardized character format.] DTHFL[An indication that the
                  subject died.]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: DTHDTC|DTHFL
                Section: Demographics
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when DTHDTC is not empty and DTHFL not equal to "Y"

Outcome.Message: DTHFL is not "Y", when DTHDTC is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: DTHDTC[The date or date and time of death, represented in a standardized character format.] DTHFL[An indication that the subject died.]
